title: Concerned about my purchase
body: This isn't going to be some random pity post or flame, but i am genuinely curious about my purchase. I know for a fact that i use ip for all my champion purchases (with an exception for fizz last year i believe), and i had around 1650 rp with around 13000 ip. I purchased Viktor, and as I said, with ip, and my rp did not change at all. I remember looking at it to make sure I had enough for he upcoming Blood Moon Diana, and then I come back after a week to find my rp was subtracted by 880. I'm completely sure I made the purchase with ip, and now it has been depleted from my rp. I would rather have the Diana skin i've asked for for two years then a mage i just bought for test reasons. I would like to If im wrong but i hope i dont have to buy more rp. Trying to ween off :3

replies.body: It sounds strange that it may have taken RP instead of IP so I took a look to see what happened.  I was able to confirm that the purchase was made for RP in this case.  Per our [refund ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ)guidelines, an account can use their refund tokens to perform a refund.  If you don't have any left, just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We can't make any guarantees but we do like to look at each case individually.  Hopefully we can work something out!
Thats a bit sad to hear that I messed up. Thanks for the response though!
